alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Kosciusko; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 2:09PM EST until further notice by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Huntington, Wells, Jay, Wabash and Blackford Counties. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Cass IN, Kosciusko, Wabash and Whitley Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Wells and Adams Counties. Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Marshall, Pulaski, Fulton IN, Kosciusko and Starke Counties. Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting Carroll, Pulaski and White Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River near Ora. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect streets and homes in Monterey. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Friday /12:45 PM CST Friday/ the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 13.2 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
